movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets from their subconscious.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.description: An astronaut is mistakenly presumed dead and left behind on Mars. He uses his ingenuity to survive and signal to Earth that he is alive.
